name: Just Slide 2
description:
Harder than Expected !

Can you paint all the maze?

Presenting the advanced version of “Just Slide” with much varieties in all the aspects except no change in the soothing background music.

The graphics are improved and puzzles are designed harder than before.

Discover it more by playing it!

Use arrow keys or WASD to move the slider. 

Retry key (R) migh be useful when one wrong move makes the level impossible to be completed (may be level 2?)
